## How to include figures: 

(ref:figlab1) *OREV procedure**. Test for a figure caption.

```{r fig1, echo = F, include = T, out.width = "100%", fig.align = "center", fig.cap = "(ref:figlab1)"}
knitr::include_graphics("../figures/orev.png")
```
